@graph.name: How to Use Optizen for Shopify SEO
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to implementing Optizen features for improved Shopify store SEO performance.

step.name: Install Optizen App
step.text: Install Optizen from the Shopify App Store to your Shopify store.

step.name: Add Collection Page Content
step.text: Use the HTML WYSIWYG editor to add content below the product grid on collection pages.

step.name: Optimize Tag Pages
step.text: Edit SEO titles, descriptions, H1 tags, and index settings for tag pages to improve SEO performance.

step.name: Configure Variant Features
step.text: For Enterprise users: Set up variant tagging and image thumbnail matching for enhanced user experience.

mainEntity.name: What makes Optizen different from other Shopify SEO apps?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen provides unique features like adding content below product grids on collection pages and comprehensive tag page optimization, which are not available in standard Shopify installations or most themes.

mainEntity.name: Can I add content below the product grid on collection pages?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Optizen allows you to add content below the product grid on any collection page using a simple HTML WYSIWYG editor, addressing a major limitation of most Shopify themes.

mainEntity.name: What tag page optimization features does Optizen offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen allows you to edit SEO titles, SEO descriptions, page descriptions (above and below product grid), H1/page titles, and add index/noindex tags for search engines on tag pages.
Enterprise features include Variant Tagger for syncing product variants as tags, and Variant Image Thumbnail Matcher for displaying correct variant images on tag pages.
